column4: anyone willing to help with update manager problems? i really need to update and it won't. I need fixes for 8.04 :( please help
﻿fde: there is no "error" the manager simply "crashes" after hitting install updates. I think it crashes when it tries to bring up authorization
﻿kitche:﻿the manager simply "crashes" after hitting install updates. I think it crashes when it tries to bring up authorization
start "update-manager" in a terminal and see what happens
